column1: standing in ancient forest glade, moonlight filtering through silver leaves
atop castle battlements, war banner streaming in the wind
beside crystal-clear mountain stream, reflection showing destiny
in candlelit wizard's tower, arcane symbols glowing around her
at the entrance to dragon's lair, sword drawn and ready
in sacred temple ruins, divine light streaming from above
beside campfire in wilderness, stars brilliant overhead
on windswept cliff overlooking vast kingdom below
in enchanted garden where flowers bloom eternal
at crossroads where three paths meet, choosing her fate
in ancient library filled with mystical tomes
beside portal to other realms, magic crackling in the air
in throne room of forgotten dynasty, crown at her feet
at edge of magical waterfall, mist swirling with power
in field of battle after victory, allies celebrating behind
